messages.subject: Homeschool Kids Magazine & Homeschool Mums Magazine!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there everyone, I m sorry I have notified you that the new issues are online for you to view - I have been busy shifting house!  Boxes are everywhere! I
messages.messageBody:
Hi there everyone,

I'm sorry I have notified you that the new issues are online for you
to view - I have been busy shifting house! Boxes are everywhere!

I have combined February and March for the Homeschool Kids Magazine
as there weren't many entries. Please view it at:
http://pages.ivillage.com/mumof4nz/homeschoolkidsmagazine
Please email submissions to:
homeschool_kids_magazine@...

I have uploaded all submissions I have received so far for the
HOmeschool Mums Magazine, which can be viewed at:
http://pages.ivillage.com/mumof4nz/homeschoolmumsmagazine
Please email submissions to:
mumof4nz@...

Please keep sending in your submissions for these magazines - they
are nothing without your input!

Have a great day everyone!

Teresa :)
Editor
Homeschool Kids Magazine
Homeschool Mums Magazine
